snippet: Share of the company, which operates the Redbox movie-rental kiosks, rose 7 percent on Friday.
abstract: Coinstar, operator of the Redbox movie-rental kiosks, says in preliminary report that its first-quarter sales and profit exceeded its February forecast, driven by higher prices; shares rise 7 percent to $65.78 on news.
lead_paragraph: Share of the company, which operates the Redbox movie-rental kiosks, rose 7 percent on Friday.

headline.main: Coinstar Surges on Preliminary Quarterly Results
headline.print_headline: Coinstar Surges On Preliminary Quarterly Results
